text: Omri Sharon (Hebrew: עמרי שרון; born 19 August 1964) is a former Israeli politician of Likud and Kadima. He is the son of Ariel Sharon, who was prime minister from 2001 till 2006. Sharon Jr. was a major in the IDF and a Member of Knesset from 2003 till 2006. He was found guilty of corruption charges in 2006 and was sentenced to prison. ==Other websites== * Omri Sharon, Knesset website Category:1964 births Category:Living people Category:Members of the Knesset Category:Israeli prisoners Category:Jewish Israeli criminals Category:Jewish Israeli politicians Category:Jewish military people Category:Kadima politicians Category:Likud politicians Category:Israeli majors
title: Omri Sharon
